course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Soils and Waves
course.description: Fundamentals of soil behavior including the clay minerals will be revisited.  The basics of both mechanical and electromagnetic waves will be briefly introduced first, followed by a particular emphasis on the relevant applications to characterizations of particulate material's behavior.
course.prerequisites: CIVL 3720 (prior to 2018-19) AND CIVL 4700
